meaningMnemonic: Let's go <kanji>view</kanji> some <kanji>sunlight</kanji>! Oh wait, we can't do that here. We will have to go <vocabulary>sightseeing</vocabulary> to go see this amazing sunlight thing.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
